trans-unit.source: Indicates that a field of a serializable class should not be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Angir at et felt av en serialiserbar klasse ikke skal serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> or <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter> classes to serialize an object, use the NonSerializedAttribute attribute to prevent a field from being serialized.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>eller <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter>klasser å serialisere et objekt bruke attributtet NonSerializedAttribute til å hindre at et felt som serialiseres.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Soap.SoapFormatter> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this attribute to prevent the serialization of sensitive data.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke dette attributtet å hindre at serialisering av sensitive data.

trans-unit.source: The target objects for the NonSerializedAttribute attribute are public and private fields of a serializable class.
trans-unit.target: Målobjektene for attributtet NonSerializedAttribute er offentlige og private felt av en serialiserbar klasse.

trans-unit.source: By default, classes are not serializable unless they are marked with <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er klasser ikke serialiserbare hvis de er merket med <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>.</xref:System.SerializableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: During the serialization process all the public and private fields of a class are serialized by default.
trans-unit.target: Behandle alle offentlige og private felt av en klasse er serialisert som standard under serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Fields marked with NonSerializedAttribute are excluded during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Felt merket med NonSerializedAttribute utelates under serialisering.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to serialize an object, use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute> class to get the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>klassen for å serialisere et objekt, må du bruke den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute>klassen for å få de samme funksjonene.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, implement the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface to explicitly control the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også implementere den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>grensesnitt eksplisitt styre serialisering prosessen.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: Note that classes that implement <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> must still be marked with <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at klasser som Implementer <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>må være merket med <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>.</xref:System.SerializableAttribute> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: To apply the NonSerializedAttribute class to an event, set the attribute location to field, as shown in the following C# code.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke klassen NonSerializedAttribute på en hendelse, angi attributtet plasseringen til felt, som vist i C# koden nedenfor.

trans-unit.source: ``` [field:NonSerializedAttribute()] public event ChangedEventHandler Changed; ``` If a field is not serialized, but it still requires a default value that must be supplied after deserialization, you can create a method that supplies the field with a value, then apply the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnDeserializedAttribute> to the method.
trans-unit.target: ``` [field:NonSerializedAttribute()] public event ChangedEventHandler Changed; ```Hvis et felt ikke er serialisert, men det fremdeles krever en standardverdi må oppgis etter deserialisering, kan du opprette en metode som leverer feltet med en verdi og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnDeserializedAttribute>til metoden.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnDeserializedAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker attributter [attributter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.NonSerializedAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.NonSerializedAttribute"> </xref> klasse.
